Big Lava Pits
From the Pits Wiki
wow!! i bet it sounds like "phhghghhtthghthgthgthg phshshshshhhshbhshbshb bmngnmbgmgnmbg"

Big Lava Pits are really crazy awesome pits that have a ton of really cool liquid inside of them.

Sometimes, near mountains and in oceans, Big Lava Pits may form. Contrary to what the name might imply, the substance, while inside Big Lava Pits, is actually not known as lava - it is actually known as "Liquid Portal to the Dimension of Really High Pressure and Heat and Gravity". It is not recommended to enter these pits.

Tastiness

It is not recommended to eat the liquid inside of a Big Lava Pit. After several years of attempting to study the liquid inside of the Big Lava Pit, our Pit Scientists have came to the conclusion that the Big Lava Pit contains some form of lava[disputable] [citation needed]. As lava is known being overrated and considerably bland-tasting, it is recommended to stay away.
